about.name: Isaiah Hamilton
about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.description: I'm a 15 year old full stack developer based in Atlanta. I have strong passion a for coding and building things that impact people's day to day lives and to make them better. I am interested in Typescript, Next.js, Deno, Supabase, and building consumer apps + developer tools. In my free time, you can see skating, gaming, exploring, and talking to new people.
